title: Raising to a Power
description:
Build a program from the blocks in the tray that uses the math library, declares a math object, and calls the raise to the power action. Edit the action to find 3 to the power of 5 and output the following message.

3 to the power of 5 is 243
hint: Start by adding the use block for the Math library. Next, add the math object block. Then place the correct action block that calculates a value to the power of a second value. Once the block is placed, replace the word value with 3 and power with 5 so the action can do the calculation. Then add the output block, which outputs text and the result of the action you placed into the program. When your program is done run your program and check your answer.
